title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4082.3 - Amounts of awards and premiums
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4082.3 - Amounts of awards and premiums

State Regulations

Awards to breeders and stallion owners and premiums
paid to owners of New York-breds shall not be fixed amounts. The amounts paid
shall be equal to percentages of purse moneys paid to the owners of the New

York-breds finishing first, second, third or fourth and shall be set by the
commission of directors. A schedule of the award and premium percentages shall
be made available prior to January 1st of each year and may be changed from
time to time by majority vote. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4082.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
